title: VMware security advisory (AV25-839)
description: Between December 8 and 14, 2025, VMware published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple Tanzu products.
products: VMware Tanzu RabbitMQ on Kubernetes  versions prior to 4.1.6
VMware Tanzu RabbitMQ on Kubernetes  versions prior to 4.2.1
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
